# 8.0 Docs

## Core .NET libraries

- [Activity operation name when null](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/activity-operation-name.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the operation name of an Activity is stored as an empty string if it's specified as null when the activity is created.
- [AnonymousPipeServerStream.Dispose behavior](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/anonymouspipeserverstream-dispose.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the behavior of AnonymousPipeServerStream.Dispose has changed for servers that are created for out-of-proc communication.
- [API obsoletions with custom diagnostic IDs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/obsolete-apis-with-custom-diagnostics.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where some APIs have been marked as obsolete with a custom diagnostic ID.
- [Backslash mapping in Unix file paths](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/file-path-backslash.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the CoreCLR native runtime no longer maps backslashes to forward slashes in file paths on Unix.
- [Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 methods ignore whitespace](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/decodefromutf8-whitespace.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 and Base64.DecodeFromUtf8InPlace methods ignore whitespace in the input.
- [Boolean-backed enum type support removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/bool-backed-enum.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where support for parsing, formatting, and conversions of Boolean-backed enumeration types has been removed.
- [Complex.ToString format changed to `<a; b>`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/complex-format.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the Complex.ToString() format changed from `(a, b)` to `<a; b>`.
- [Drive's current directory path enumeration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/drive-current-dir-paths.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where files are enumerated without a separator after the path when the path is the drive's current directory.
- [Enumerable.Sum throws new OverflowException for some inputs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/enumerable-sum.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where Enumerable.Sum can throw new OverflowException exceptions for certain inputs.
- [FileStream writes when pipe is closed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/filestream-disposed-pipe.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where an exception is thrown if you write to a FileStream whose underlying pipe is closed.
- [FindSystemTimeZoneById doesn't return new object](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/timezoneinfo-object.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById doesn't return a new TimeZoneInfo object.
- [GC.GetGeneration might return Int32.MaxValue](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/getgeneration-return-value.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where GC.GetGeneration might return Int32.MaxValue for certain object types.
- [GetFolderPath behavior on Unix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/getfolderpath-unix.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the behavior of Environment.GetFolderPath has changed on Unix.
- [GetSystemVersion no longer returns ImageRuntimeVersion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/getsystemversion.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where RuntimeEnvironment.GetSystemVersion no longer returns ImageRuntimeVersion, which is a .NET Framework-oriented value.
- [ITypeDescriptorContext nullable annotations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/itypedescriptorcontext-props.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the nullable annotations on three ITypeDescriptorContext properties have changed.
- [Legacy Console.ReadKey removed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/console-readkey-legacy.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where the legacy Console.ReadKey implementation has been removed.
- [LDAP APIs not available on .NET Standard / .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/ldap-netstandard-apis.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where TrustedCertificatesDirectory and StartNewTlsSessionContext are not available when targeting .NET Standard 2.0.
- [Method builders generate parameters with HasDefaultValue=false](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/parameterinfo-hasdefaultvalue.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder now generate method parameters with HasDefaultValue set to false.
- [Package part URIs are now compared case-insensitively in System.IO.Packaging](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/system-io-packaging-case-insensitive-uri.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 8 where System.IO.Packaging now compares package part URIs case-insensitively to align with the OPC specification.
- [ProcessStartInfo.WindowStyle honored when UseShellExecute is false](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/processstartinfo-windowstyle.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where ProcessStartInfo.WindowStyle is now honored even when UseShellExecute is false.
- [RuntimeIdentifier returns platform for which runtime was built](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/runtimeidentifier.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where RuntimeInformation.RuntimeIdentifier returns the platform for which the runtime was built.
- [Type.GetType() throws exception for all invalid element types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/8.0/type-gettype.md): Learn about the .NET 8 breaking change in core .NET libraries where 'Type.GetType' throws a TypeLoadException for all invalid element types.
